img_summary: The image shows a decorative, double-gourd shaped vase with intricate floral patterns. The vase features a dark blue-green background with white and red floral designs, including a prominent red flower at the top. The craftsmanship suggests it may be an in-game item or artifact from a video game, possibly used for decorative or collectible purposes.
